featuresSection.title: AI-Powered Legal Assistant for Rural India
featuresSection.subtitle: We make justice accessible by translating complex paperwork into simple conversations, ensuring no one is left behind due to legal jargon or digital illiteracy.

voice.title: Simple Voice Conversations
voice.desc: Helps villagers complete legal and government paperwork through natural Hindi and regional dialects.

docs.title: Auto-Generates Documents
docs.desc: Creates ready-to-submit forms, affidavits, and legal notices based on your conversation.

issues.title: Solves Common Issues
issues.desc: Expertly handles Aadhaar, pension, land disputes, missing certificates, and fraud-related cases.

escalation.title: Human Escalation
escalation.desc: For complex issues, we seamlessly connect you with qualified local paralegals for expert assistance.

aboutSection.title: Bridging the Justice Gap for 900 Million Indians
aboutSection.subtitle: Essential legal processes are broken for rural communities. From inaccessible government services to intimidating court procedures, the system is designed for failure.

errors.title: Document & Court Summons Errors
errors.desc: Low digital literacy and complex legal language lead to mistakes and missed deadlines.

gaps.title: Welfare Scheme & Land Gaps
gaps.desc: Outdated records and middlemen exploitation block access to rightful benefits and property claims.

access.title: Limited Legal Access
access.desc: Courts are far, lawyers are expensive, and reliable legal aid is often out of reach for many villagers.

whyNowSection.title: The Perfect Confluence of Factors
whyNowSection.subtitle: We are uniquely positioned to deliver AI-powered legal access to 900 million underserved Indians because the technology, infrastructure, and user readiness have finally aligned.

factors.one: Digital India infrastructure is now operational and widespread.
factors.two: Advanced AI models for local languages have matured and are reliable.
factors.three: Government legal aid reforms are expanding rapidly.
factors.four: Rural digital adoption and trust in online platforms are at an all-time high.

howItWorksSection.title: From Conversation to Resolution in 6 Simple Steps

one.name: Access
one.desc: User opens the Nyaya Saathi app or visits a nearby kiosk.

two.name: Speak the Problem
two.desc: User explains the issue in Hindi or their local dialect; no legal terms needed.

three.name: AI Understands
three.desc: Our AI extracts key information, identifies the issue, and asks clarifying questions.

four.name: Auto-Generate Documents
four.desc: The system instantly fills forms and generates affidavits, letters, or certificates.

five.name: Guide & Submit
five.desc: We provide clear voice guidance, print necessary forms, and help track the status.

six.name: Human Escalation
six.desc: Complex cases are intelligently routed to our network of local paralegals for expert help.
